page.title: 03Hexham East First School.
page.content: Our school is a First school for children aged from nearly 5 to 9.We have a{nursery}for children 3 to 41/2, and a unit for children with{hearing {and speech problems.}Altogether we have 200 pupils,a head,5 teachers for 5 classes,2 teachers in the{unit}for 9 children,1 teacher and 1 nurse for 50 part time in the nursery.9 ladies work in the kitchen making dinners. It is a modern,light building with a big field and views over the Tyne valley.It was built in 1961.The pupils live nearby, the unit children from a distance travel by taxi. We have a good{parent-teacher {association}to arrange fund raising and other events like barbecues and Hallowe'en parties.When we leave here we go to Hexham Middle School from 9 to 13,then to the High School. Laura Fishburn,Amy cain,LisaRollingson
